definitions.definition: Any plant of the genus Hydrophyllum .
Any plant of Hydrophyllaceae , the waterleaf family.
A tropical plant ( Talinum fruticosum ), the leaves of which are eaten as a vegetable.
A leaf-shaped decoration used on the capitals of columns in late 12th-century Romanesque architecture
An absorbent unsized paper, somewhat like blotter paper.

main_definition: ( botany ) Any plant of the genus Hydrophyllum .
secondary_definitions: ( botany ) Any plant of Hydrophyllaceae , the waterleaf family.
A tropical plant ( Talinum fruticosum ), the leaves of which are eaten as a vegetable.
( architecture ) A leaf-shaped decoration used on the capitals of columns in late 12th-century Romanesque architecture
( paper technology ) An absorbent unsized paper, somewhat like blotter paper.
